data.name: Agents of Mayhem - Safeword Agent Pack
data.detailed_description:
If you can build it, she can hack it. Safeword has little patience for stupidity, even less for LEGION. Assemble an army of cybersecurity experts, it doesn’t matter. The woman’s a walking infrastructure threat, and nothing—from your email password to your doomsday weapon—is safe.

Content included:


  • Safeword character
  • 4 agent skins
  • 5 weapon skins
  • 1 Gremlin tech
  • 1 vehicle skin
  • 1 unlock mission
  • 1 personal mission

The woman’s a walking infrastructure threat, and nothing—from your email password to your doomsday weapon—is safe.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i3-3240 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • メモリー: 8192 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or above / or AMD equivalent
  • ストレージ: 38 MB 利用可能
pc_requirements.recommended:
推奨:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • プロセッサー: Intel Core i5-4670K or above / or AMD equivalent
  • メモリー: 12288 MB RAM
  • グラフィック: GeForce GTX 1060 or above / or AMD equivalent
  • ストレージ: 38 MB 利用可能
